Key Match Events: On a Bulls possession in the third quarter Friday, guard Zach LaVine made a backdoor cut and sank a reverse layup. As he ran back in transition, the Bulls lost Cavaliers guard Caris LeVert, who knocked down a corner three-pointer.
The Bulls’ performance in their 139-137 preseason victory against the Cavaliers in overtime was characterized by a sequence of good plays immediately followed by mistakes.
